name: Fingertips fairy tale-Red Hat Pick Mushroom
name_original: Fingertips fairy tale-Red Hat Pick Mushroom
description:
There is a lovely little girl, she called Little Red Riding Hood, she was wearing a beautiful flower skirt into the dense forest.
There are towering trees in the forest, there are flowers attached to the tree, there are lovely flowers, as well as delicious mushrooms.
Little Red Hat carrying a small basket, ready to pick mushrooms.
but,
What she did not notice was that there were a lot of dangers in the forest.
Cruel and cunning wolf is looking at her behind the trees, ready to put her down.
Little Red Riding Hood must be careful!
